td.content: s:71 YO m presents with 2 days history of severe acute onset of shortness of breath, severe left sided pleuritic chest pain and severe unilateral left leg swelling. o:Height 65 in, Weight 181 lbs, Temperature 97.8 F, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 104, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 14 a:Deep Venous Thrombosis p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to hematology.

s:pt describes severe left sided pleuritic chest pain, severe acute onset of shortness of breath, severe unilateral left leg swelling and Blood. he is a 71 YO white male retired. o:Height 65 in, Weight 185 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 16 a:Deep Venous Thrombosis p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered thrombectomy - femoral vein.
